verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Come home, come home. newline Ye who are weary, come home. newline Earnestly, tenderly Jesus is calling, newline Calling, "O sinner, come home!"

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling, newline Calling for you and for me. newline See, on the portals, newline He's waiting and watching, newline Watching for you and for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Why should we tarry newline When Jesus is pleading, newline Pleading for you and for me? newline Why should we linger newline And heed not His mercies, newline Mercies for you and for me?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Time is now fleeting; newline The moments are passing, newline Passing from you and from me. newline Shadows are gathering; newline Death's night is coming, newline Coming for you and for me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Oh for the wonderful newline Love He has promised, newline Promised for you and for me! newline Though we have sinned, newline He has mercy and pardon, newline Pardon for you and for me.
